org.sensorhub.api.service

Class CommandEvent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.api.common.Event
      • org.sensorhub.api.service.ServiceEvent
        • org.sensorhub.api.service.CommandEvent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public class CommandEvent
extends ServiceEvent

    Type of event generated when new command are received by control services. It is immutable and carries command data by reference
